title: No Such Thing As Too Many QB's
itunes:title: No Such Thing As Too Many QB's
description:
Colin discusses the importance of drafting QBs, when Tom Brady retires, and what the Steelers are probably thinking watching Hard Knocks. Guests include Mark Schlereth, Greg Cosell, John Elway, and Jason McIntyre. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
